sentence: i would like to find a flight from charlotte north carolina to las vegas . i would like a stopover in saint louis
sq2:
SELECT DISTINCT  '"'||v1.airport_code||'"', '"'||v2.city_code||'"',
 '"'||v2.city_name||'"', '"'||v3.state_code||'"', '"'||v3.state_name||'"',
 '"'||v4.airport_code||'"', '"'||v5.city_code||'"',
 '"'||v5.city_name||'"', '"'||v6.flight_id||'"',
 '"'||v7.airport_code||'"', '"'||v8.city_code||'"', '"'||v8.city_name||'"',
 v6.stop_number FROM flight v0, airport_service v1,
 city v2, state v3, airport_service v4, city v5, flight_stop v6,
 airport_service v7, city v8 
WHERE (((v0.from_airport = ANY v1.airport_code) 
AND ((v1.city_code = ANY v2.city_code) 
AND ((v2.city_name = 'CHARLOTTE') AND ((v2.state_code = ANY v3.state_code) 
AND (v3.state_name = 'NORTH CAROLINA'))))) 
AND (((v0.to_airport = ANY v4.airport_code) AND ((v4.city_code = ANY v5.city_code) 
AND (v5.city_name = 'LAS VEGAS'))) 
AND ((v0.flight_id = ANY v6.flight_id) AND ((v6.stop_airport = ANY v7.airport_code) 
AND ((v7.city_code = ANY v8.city_code) 
AND (v8.city_name = 'ST. LOUIS'))))));
sql: ( SELECT DISTINCT FLIGHT.FLIGHT_ID FROM FLIGHT WHERE ( FLIGHT . FROM_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE ( CITY.CITY_NAME = ' CHARLOTTE ' AND CITY . STATE_CODE IN ( SELECT STATE . STATE_CODE FROM STATE WHERE STATE.STATE_NAME = ' NORTH CAROLINA ' ) ) ) ) AND ( FLIGHT . TO_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' LAS VEGAS ' ) ) AND FLIGHT . FLIGHT_ID IN ( SELECT FLIGHT_STOP . FLIGHT_ID FROM FLIGHT_STOP WHERE FLIGHT_STOP . STOP_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' ST. LOUIS ' ) ) ) ) ) ) ;
